text:
Hi everyone!
Having a bit of an issue with batch archiving labelled associations between contacts and companies. We have contact:company associations with multiple labels, say, "contact_1"  associated with "company_1" with labels "label_1" and "label_2". We would like to delete/archive in batch specific labels from specific contact<->company associations, let's say "label_2" between "contact_1" and "contact_2". The `POST .../crm/v3/associations/{fromObjectType}/{toObjectType}/batch/archive` end-point accepts both contact and company ids as well as label types as inputs, however, calling it removes all labels/association between the two objects, and not just the specified label. So the question is, is it possible to delete specific labels only between specific objects in such a call?
Thank you!
Hi , Can any one help me how to change the body content in HubSpot CRM card when we click on different buttons below. Please help me:thinking_face: or serverlessFunction how to receive the responce.

Hello All
How to create Task Queue names using api?

Hey guys, I am trying to add a custom objectType to a CRM Card. The goal is, that the CRM Card of my app is visible in a customObject within a HubSpot Account. I tried this via the *`/crm/v3/extensions/cards/{appId}/{cardId}`* endpoint but received the error, that my custom object does not match the accepted Enum class. Do you guys know how I can display my custom CRM card in a customObject?
You currently can't use normal custom cards with custom object records, just on normal crm records
you can use developer projects CRM cards on custom objects though
It sounds like this is a one off (one portal build) anyway so developer projects cards are definitely going to be the way you should built your card
okay got it thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
of course

Hello!

Can anyone help me with the date format that is returned by the HubSpot API? How can I return a valid date format?
It uses epoc unix milliseconds format
how would you like the date returned?
YYYY-MM-DD
and which language are you using to get data from the api?
None, just Postman
understood, but you can't change how the date is formatted directly from a response in postman, which language will you be using with the api?
after you finish testing with postman

Hi! Some days ago, we started getting `403 Forbidden` responses to every single call we do with our Private App. We are 100% sure the scopes are correct.
We think that we might be banned or something similar as it all started when an external company was doing a scheduled penetration test to our systems.
That ended up with us making API calls to import contacts into HubSpot with code in the last name properties (they were testing code injection).
We opened a ticket but we got no response yet. Can someone help me with this? I can provide further details in DM.

Checking the response of the requests:
```Access denied | <http://api.hubapi.com|api.hubapi.com> used Cloudflare to restrict access```

Hello! Question on if a specific property is available via API.

On the deal object, there is a standard property "dealstage" that returns the dealstage internal value (images below). For custom stages, this is value is just a numeric id. Is there a way to return the "label" value via API? If not, is the "internal value" field truly fixed? Or is there some way to set it manually?
<@U04EW5MS4KG> for visibility
object type is 0-3 (deal)
You can get the properties with label and values using the schemas api
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects#endpoint?spec=GET-/crm/v3/schemas>
Excellent! The team at Merge API thanks you for your help Carter!
Of course, glad I could help
Your guy's website is very pretty :heart_eyes:
Thanks Carter! If you find yourself needing integrations give us a shout!
That doesn’t seem to have webpage visits. I suppose that is behavioral events, not marketing events.
Yep for that you'll want to use this api: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/analytics/get-analytics-data-by-object>
Thanks! When I use this endpoint, I get zero results (even with status 200). That’s without using any parameters. any suggestions?

Hi Everyone,
I need help with batch updating contact properties, I want to update my contact by email instead of by HubSpot contactid, I tried to use “idProperty” : “email” but I cant get it to work. Can you please help.
